# The `SIPostRABundler.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass creates bundles of memory instructions to protect adjacent loads and stores from being rescheduled apart from each other post-RA. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This pass creates bundles of memory instructions to protect adjacent loads and stores from being rescheduled apart from each other post-RA.
